data.text: Nlhove ninohimiacha ihu phi nna, wiira nihanaa Opochera ishaani olhupalhe o yeyo iphiro iyo, nokhalha wiimonono wo ihiche yo Nthimicho ya Nlhuku wiirimu,
novara ntheko wa Opochera ishaani Mulhupalhe va Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene, va nihema no ikekhiaye nithekiye ni Athithi, nihithekiye ni attu.
Kila Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nothanlhiya apange ntheko wo ukumiha izawadi ni ishaani wa Nlhuku. Ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ihu lazima ni uyo akhalhaneke ittu yo ukumiha chiicho.
Ikaari Kuristo aari o velhaponi va, kaakhalha opochera ishaani ata vakani, ukhalhawaya ilhapo ihaana opochera ishaani anokumiha isadaka wo utwariha chilheheriye ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa.

Ntheko unopanga aya wo upochera ishaani, phi iramani yo chittu chinopangiya wiirimu. Yayo anolhikaana thoko ashinna Musa vaatameria aya utheka nihema, Nlhuku venre awe, “Mmweheke rata, mwapangeke kila ittu thoko chenre aka wo uwonihani umwaakoni ulhe.”

Nansho vano Yesu hovahiya ntheko wo ulhoka chinene upwaha wa opochera ishaani alhe, ukhalhawaya vano yoyo phi o weewananiha malhehano arenree. Uno malhove ari nhina yayo malhehano ayo emelhelhaka nlhove nirenree na Nlhuku.
Ukhalhawaya yakaari malhehano o upacha alhe khayaakhuwachiye, attu khaathananiya ukhalhana malhehano o nayelhi.
Nansho Nlhuku voonne awe attu ahotteka aamunke wo wiira,
Yayo malhehano ayo khanowa aalhikaana ni malhehano alhehanne aka ni manyaapwiiya aya,
Ukhalhawaya alha phi malhehano kinohalha aka upanga wa attu o inupa yo Israeli.
Khaawo ntu nohalha mena weettuchiha achihima we,
Nlhuku vaalhenhe awe Malhehano o Naanano, Malhehano o Khalhayi ayo ahothalha. Ni ittu yo khalhayi yathaalhaka, ihophiyelha vanorihiya aya.
